document_data.mainbody: '''"So High a Price"''' is a short story by [[Ed Greenwood]] first published in the 1994 anthology ''[[Realms of Infamy]]'', and reprinted in the 2005 anthology ''[[The Best of the Realms II]]''.
document_data.Summary: In the {{YearlinkName|1334}}, [[Manshoon]] is determined to overthrow the [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|council]] of [[Zhentil Keep]], and plots with [[Fzoul Chembryl]] toward this end. The great sage [[Elminster]], disguised as a [[beholder]], manages to stop the duo.
